headline: Gartner (IT) Valuation Check As AI Disruption Concerns And Recent Weak Quarter Weigh On Sentiment
summary: Recent commentary around Gartner (IT) has focused on how artificial intelligence may be cutting into demand for its research services, with Jim Cramer highlighting the stock’s sharp 2025 underperformance and a recent quarter he described as disappointing. See our latest analysis for Gartner. Recent price action reflects this tension. Gartner’s 30 day share price return of 7.6% and year to date gain of 4.1% contrast with a 1 year total shareholder return decline of 50.2%, suggesting longer...
